BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Krueger, S.1673, and Assembly Member Lopez, A.4069, “AN ACT to amend the local emergency housing rent control act, in relation to rent regulation laws”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Local emergency housing rent control act.

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.6331-A, and Assembly Member Brennan, A.8023-B, “AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to annual statements of disclosure for any city with a population of one million or more”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Annual statements of disclosure for any city with population of million or more.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Krueger, S.1673, and Assembly Member Lopez, A.4069, “AN ACT to amend the local emergency housing rent control act, in relation to rent regulation laws”.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Local emergency housing rent control act.
